name: connectivity
description:
The connectivity command analyzes how well connected the road network is. It identifies:

- Number of connected components
- Size of largest component
- Isolated road segments
- Network coverage statistics

Useful for identifying disconnected areas or data quality issues.
usage: osmfast connectivity map.osm --mode walk -f geojson -o components.geojson

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: drive, walk, bike (default: drive)

output:
Connectivity analysis showing:
- Total nodes and edges
- Number of connected components
- Largest component size and coverage %
- List of isolated segments (if requested)
- GeoJSON of components (if geojson format)
